product_name: APPALACHIAN TRAIL CONSERVANCY Appalachian Trail Guide: Massachusetts to Connecticut - 12th Edition - Guidebook and Maps
long_description: The updated edition of Appalachian Trail Guide: Massachusetts - Connecticut helps you plan your thru-hike of the Appalachian Trail and includes 2 trail-ready, water-resistant topo maps.
short_description: The updated edition of Appalachian Trail Guide: Massachusetts - Connecticut helps you plan your thru-hike of the Appalachian Trail and includes 2 trail-ready, water-resistant topo maps.
